NoAvailableCoursesReturnHomeText:
You're currently not enlisted to a course.
Please return to the welcome screen.
The go to the AdLer Moodle and
enlist yourself in a course
or ask your teacher for enlisting.

worldManagement.title: World Management
worldManagement.cannotDeletePreinstalled: Preinstalled learning worlds cannot be deleted.
worldManagement.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the learning world "{{worldName}}"? This will free {{size}} of storage.

validationErrors.FILE_TOO_LARGE: File is too large. Maximum: 950 MB.
validationErrors.INVALID_EXTENSION: Invalid file format. Please upload an .mbz file.
validationErrors.INVALID_GZIP_MAGIC: The file is not a valid MBZ file. Please check the file format.
validationErrors.DECOMPRESSION_BOMB: File is too large when extracted. Possibly corrupted.
validationErrors.INVALID_FILE_PATH: The MBZ file contains invalid file paths.
validationErrors.MISSING_WORLD_DOCUMENT: The MBZ file does not contain a valid world document.
validationErrors.INVALID_WORLD_TYPE: The world document has an invalid type.
validationErrors.MISSING_WORLD_NAME: The world document does not contain a world name.
validationErrors.WORLD_NAME_TOO_LONG: The world name is too long (max. 200 characters).
validationErrors.INVALID_SPACES: The world document does not contain a valid space list.
validationErrors.INVALID_ELEMENTS: The world document does not contain a valid element list.
validationErrors.INVALID_ELEMENT_STRUCTURE: At least one element is incomplete.
validationErrors.INVALID_ELEMENT_ID: At least one element has an invalid ID.
validationErrors.FILE_READ_ERROR: The file could not be read.
